attributes.additional_details:
Also, some meat should be pre-cut and some in full, that way knifes can’t be taken into streets.


There should also be a ban where there is no more than 3 persons together. If people are found to be in gangs then they should be separated and if they don’t listen then action should be taken against them. People might think this is strict and absurd, but people feel intimidated and crime is likely to happen. 

So, these bans should be put in place as soon as possible.
attributes.background: There has been so many stabbings, some fatal, some minor and it’s gotten way out of hand. There’s been police cuts which is linking to knife crime, I’m doing this petition so that there’s a complete knife from stores and homes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
